play_player(player: Player, i: int, windows_param: list) → int[source]

This function make a player play. To test if the split method work well change 52 by 16 in the class deck and add a condition that card.value==10 we will have the possibility to split each time

Parameters

  • windows_param –

  • i – this index allow us to know where we are in the list to pop the good element

  • player – this is the player who is about to play

Returns

the number of elements we have add to the list
